name: Rotaction
description:
Surrounded.
Constantly spinning around.
Fending off foes.

Rotaction is a 2D arcade action game where you spin around shooting enemies with different coloured bullets, trying to get the highest score before they overwhelm you.

Made in Unity.
Sprites made in Aesprite.

Controls:

PCControllerPhoneAimMouseRight StickOn Screen StickWhite BulletLMBR1/RBWhite ButtonBlack BulletRMBL1/LBBlack Button
